create or replace PACKAGE lm_thg_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_task_handling
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:19)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'LM_THG_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_TASK_HANDLING';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION thg_select_row( i_thg_STN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_thg_TDN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.TDN_ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_thg   OUT lm_task_handling%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION thg_select_row_upd( i_thg_STN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.STN_ID%TYPE
                           , i_thg_TDN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.TDN_ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_thg   OUT lm_task_handling%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE thg_lock_row( i_thg_STN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_thg_TDN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.TDN_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE thg_lock_row_nowait( i_thg_STN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_thg_TDN_ID   IN  lm_task_handling.TDN_ID%TYPE )
;


END lm_thg_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_thg_tapi_pck
is




function thg_select_row( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type
                       , o_rt_thg   out lm_task_handling%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.thg_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_thg ( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_task_handling thg
            where thg.stn_id = i_thg_stn_id 
              and thg.tdn_id = i_thg_tdn_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_thg( i_thg_stn_id => i_thg_stn_id, i_thg_tdn_id => i_thg_tdn_id );
         fetch c_thg into o_rt_thg;
         l_found := c_thg%found;
         close c_thg;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_thg%isopen
         then
            close c_thg;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end thg_select_row;

function thg_select_row_upd( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
                           , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type
                           , o_rt_thg   out lm_task_handling%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.thg_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_thg ( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
                , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_task_handling thg
            where thg.stn_id = i_thg_stn_id 
                and thg.tdn_id = i_thg_tdn_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_thg( i_thg_stn_id => i_thg_stn_id
, i_thg_tdn_id => i_thg_tdn_id );
   fetch c_thg into o_rt_thg;
   l_found := c_thg%found;
   close c_thg;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_thg%isopen
      then
         close c_thg;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end thg_select_row_upd;

procedure thg_lock_row( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.thg_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_thg ( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_task_handling thg
              where thg.stn_id = i_thg_stn_id 
                and thg.tdn_id = i_thg_tdn_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_thg_stn_id is not null
            or i_thg_tdn_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                thg_lock_row_nowait( i_thg_stn_id => i_thg_stn_id
, i_thg_tdn_id => i_thg_tdn_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_thg( i_thg_stn_id => i_thg_stn_id, i_thg_tdn_id => i_thg_tdn_id );
                  close c_thg;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_thg%isopen
         then
            close c_thg;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end thg_lock_row;

procedure thg_lock_row_nowait( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.thg_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_thg ( i_thg_stn_id   in  lm_task_handling.stn_id%type
 , i_thg_tdn_id   in  lm_task_handling.tdn_id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_task_handling thg
               where thg.stn_id = i_thg_stn_id 
                 and thg.tdn_id = i_thg_tdn_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_thg_stn_id is not null
         or i_thg_tdn_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_thg( i_thg_stn_id => i_thg_stn_id, i_thg_tdn_id => i_thg_tdn_id );

            close c_thg;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_thg%isopen
        then
           close c_thg;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'STN_ID = "'||i_thg_stn_id||'"'
                                                       ||', TDN_ID = "'||i_thg_tdn_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end thg_lock_row_nowait;


end lm_thg_tapi_pck;
